unnormalised: As per CDC guidelines, immediate isolation is crucial for confirmed cases of COVID-19, especially those with a CT score above 15. Dr. Kumar at AIIMS recommends Remdesivir for severe cases, starting with a 200mg loading dose.
normalised: As per C-D-C guidelines, immediate isolation is crucial for confirmed cases of C-O-V-I-D-nineteen, especially those with a C-T score above fifteen. Doctor Kumar at A-I-I-M-S recommends Remdesivir for severe cases, starting with a two hundred milligram loading dose.
